name: dig Title
author: digrart

sections.description: This plugin allows you to add a meta title to each post, page, or custom post type as well as archives and taxonomies directly from the WordPress editor. Simplify SEO for your WordPress site without any extra fluff.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/dig-title directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the meta box in the editor to add titles to posts, pages, or custom post types.
sections.faq:
Can I use this plugin for custom post types?

Yes, this plugin supports all public custom post types.

short_description: Just the Meta Title. / 投稿ページやアーカイブページに、ただメタタイトルを設定できるだけのプラグインです。
description: This plugin allows you to add a meta title to each post, page, or custom post type as well as archives and taxonomies directly from the WordPress editor. Simplify SEO for your WordPress site without any extra fluff.

upgrade_notice.0.1: Initial release. Fully functional plugin with no known issues.
